entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
